00040 // Executable gnuplot. NOTE: use pgnuplot instead of wgnuplot in Windows, otherwise
00041 // the pipe will not work.

00049 // File local defines
00051 #define HDR_STR                         " HDR              - GEO  : %08x CRATE         : %08x CH COUNT : %08x \n"
00052 #define DATUM_STR                       "  DATUM           - GEO  : %08x CHANNEL       : %08x ADC      : %08x UN : %08x OV : %08x \n"
00053 #define NOT_VALID_DATUM_STR     "  NOT VALID DATUM - \n"
00054 #define EOB_STR                         " EOB              - GEO  : %08x EVENT COUNTER : %08x \n"
00055 #define UNKNOWN_STR                     "\n??? UNKNOWN TAG ??? -          READ WORD     : %08x \n\n"

00079 
00080 static int channel_select( int act_channel) {
00081     char new_ch_string[10];
00082     // Clear line
00083     printf( "\r                                                                        ");
00084     printf( "\rInsert the new channel value [0..%d] (actual: %d) : ", MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS- 1, act_channel);
00085     if ( getstring( new_ch_string, 3)) {
00086         act_channel= atoi( new_ch_string);
00087         if ( act_channel< 0) {
00088             act_channel= 0;
00089         } else if ( act_channel> MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS- 1) {
00090             act_channel= MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS- 1;
00091         }
00092     }
00093     // Clear line
00094     printf( "\r                                                                        ");
00095     // restore position
00096     printf( "\r");
00097     return act_channel;
00098 }
00099 
00101 
00106 
00107 long get_time()
00108 {
00109         static long startup= 0;
00110         long time_ms;
00111 
00112 #ifdef WIN32
00113         struct _timeb timebuffer;
00114 
00115         _ftime( &timebuffer );
00116         if( !startup) {
00117                 startup= (long)timebuffer.time;
00118         }
00119         time_ms = (long)( timebuffer.time- startup) * 1000 + (long)timebuffer.millitm;
00120 #else
00121         struct timeval t1;
00122         struct timezone tz;
00123 
00124         gettimeofday(&t1, &tz);
00125         if( !startup) {
00126                 startup= (long)t1.tv_sec;
00127         }
00128         time_ms = (t1.tv_sec- startup) * 1000 + t1.tv_usec / 1000;
00129 #endif
00130 
00131         return time_ms;
00132 }

00147 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00148 
00149 {
00150     int ret_val= 0;                                                                     // procedure exit value
00151     cvt_V792_data board_data;                                           // board data
00152     user_setting_data user_setting;                                     // user settings
00153     FILE* parsed_out_file= NULL;                                        // parsed output file
00154     FILE* raw_out_file= NULL;                                           // raw output file
00155     UINT8 *data_buff= NULL;                                                     // read data buffer
00156     UINT32 data_size;
00157     int32_t vme_handle= -1;                                                     // The CAENVMELib handle
00158     long read_events= 0;
00159     const int DATA_BUFF_SIZE= 1024*1024;                        // The data buffer size
00160     BOOL paused= FALSE;
00161     unsigned long *histo_buff[ MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS];     // Histogram data buffer
00162     FILE* gnu_plot_pipe= NULL;                                          // gnu_plot pipe
00163     long next_refresh= 0;
00164     char aux_string[ 100];
00165     int act_channel= 0;
00166 
00167 
00169     // Demo application specific
00171 
00172     memset( &user_setting, 0, sizeof( user_setting));
00173     memset( &board_data, 0, sizeof( board_data));
00174     memset( histo_buff, 0, MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS* sizeof( histo_buff[0]));
00175 
00176 
00177     //
00178     // print header
00179     printf( "\n");
00180     printf( "-------------------------------------------------------\n");
00181     printf( "-              C A E N   Q T P    D E M O             -\n");
00182     printf( "-                                                     -\n");
00183     printf( "-   www.caen.it                             rev.01.00 -\n");
00184     printf( "-------------------------------------------------------\n");
00185     printf( "\n");
00186 
00187     //
00188     // init user setting module
00189     if ( !user_settings_open( &user_setting)) {
00190         ret_val= -1;
00191         goto exit_point;
00192     }
00193 
00194     //
00195     // input parameter check
00196     if ( !user_settings_parse_input_param( &user_setting, argc, (char**)argv)) {
00197         ret_val= -2;
00198         goto exit_point;
00199     }
00200     //
00201     // Vme handle initialization
00202     while ( TRUE) {
00203         if ( CAENVME_Init( cvV1718, 0, 0, &vme_handle)== cvSuccess) {
00204             user_setting.m_board_type= cvV1718;
00205             user_setting.m_board_number= 0;
00206             user_setting.m_link_number= 0;
00207             break;
00208         }
00209         if ( CAENVME_Init( cvV2718, 0, 0, &vme_handle)== cvSuccess) {
00210             user_setting.m_board_type= cvV2718;
00211             user_setting.m_board_number= 0;
00212             user_setting.m_link_number= 0;
00213             break;
00214         }
00215         TRACE("VME INIT ERROR :  press 'Q' to quit or any other key to retry\n");
00216         if ( toupper( getch()) == 'Q') {
00217             ret_val= -3;
00218             goto exit_point;
00219         }
00220     }
00221 
00223     // Library specific
00225 
00226     //
00227     // init V792 board data
00228     TRACE(  " Initializing QTP board data ... ");
00229     if ( !cvt_V792_open( &board_data, user_setting.m_base_address, vme_handle, user_setting.m_qtp_type)) {
00230         TRACE( "\nError executing cvt_V792_open \n");
00231         ret_val= -4;
00232         goto exit_point;
00233     }
00234     TRACE(  " Ok \n");
00235 
00236     //
00237     // Get system informations
00238     {
00239         UINT16 firmware_rev;
00240         UINT8  piggy_back_type;
00241         UINT16 serial_number;
00242 
00243         TRACE(  " Getting system informations ... ");
00244         if ( !cvt_V792_get_system_info( &board_data, &firmware_rev, &piggy_back_type, &serial_number)) {
00245             TRACE( "\nError executing cvt_V792_get_system_info \n");
00246             ret_val= -5;
00247             goto exit_point;
00248         }
00249         TRACE(  " Ok \n\n");
00250 
00251         // Show system infos
00252         TRACE1( "   Firmware Rev.       : %04x\n", firmware_rev);
00253         TRACE1( "   Piggy back type     : %s\n", cvt_V792_get_piggy_back_str( &board_data, piggy_back_type));
00254         TRACE1( "   Serial Number       : %04x\n", serial_number);
00255         TRACE(  "\n");
00256     }
00257     //
00258     // data clear
00259     TRACE(  " Sending data clear ... ");
00260     if ( !cvt_V792_data_clear( &board_data)) {
00261         TRACE( "\nError executing cvt_V792_data_clear \n");
00262         ret_val= -5;
00263         goto exit_point;
00264     }
00265     TRACE(  " Ok \n");
00266 
00267     //
00268     // Sliding constant
00269     TRACE(  " Setting sliding constant... ");
00270     if ( !cvt_V792_set_sliding_scale( &board_data,
00271                                       user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_sliding_scale_enable)) {
00272         TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V792_set_sliding_scale\n");
00273         ret_val= -5;
00274         goto exit_point;
00275     }
00276     TRACE(  " Ok\n");
00277 
00278     //
00279     // Zero suppression
00280     TRACE(  " Setting zero suppression... ");
00281         switch( board_data.m_type) {
00282                 case CVT_V965:
00283                 case CVT_V965_TYPE_A:
00284                 case CVT_V1785:
00285                         // Dual range board
00286                         if ( !cvt_V792_set_dual_range_zero_suppression( &board_data,
00287                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_zero_suppression_enable,
00288                                                                                                 user_setting.m_zero_suppression_param.m_step_threshold,
00289                                                                                                 &user_setting.m_zero_suppression_param.m_high_thresholds_buff[0],
00290                                                                                                 &user_setting.m_zero_suppression_param.m_thresholds_buff[0])) {
00291                                 TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V792_set_dual_range_zero_suppression\n");
00292                                 ret_val= -5;
00293                                 goto exit_point;
00294                         }
00295                         break;
00296                 default:
00297                         if ( !cvt_V792_set_zero_suppression( &board_data,
00298                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_zero_suppression_enable,
00299                                                                                                 user_setting.m_zero_suppression_param.m_step_threshold,
00300                                                                                                 &user_setting.m_zero_suppression_param.m_thresholds_buff[0])) {
00301                                 TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V792_set_zero_suppression\n");
00302                                 ret_val= -5;
00303                                 goto exit_point;
00304                         }
00305                         break;
00306         }
00307     TRACE(  " Ok\n");
00308 
00309     //
00310     // Acquisition mode
00311     TRACE(  " Setting acquisition mode ... ");
00312     if ( !cvt_V792_set_acquisition_mode( &board_data,
00313                                          user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_sliding_scale_enable,
00314                                          user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_zero_suppression_enable,
00315                                          user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_overflow_suppression_enable,
00316                                          user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_empty_enable,
00317                                          user_setting.m_acquisition_mode_param.m_count_all_events
00318                                        )) {
00319         TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V792_set_continuous_acquisition_mode \n");
00320         ret_val= -5;
00321         goto exit_point;
00322     }
00323     TRACE(  " Ok\n");
00324 
00325     //
00326     // readout mode
00327     TRACE(  " Setting readout mode ...");
00328     if ( !cvt_V792_set_readout_mode( &board_data, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE)) {
00329         TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V792_set_readout_mode \n");
00330         ret_val= -5;
00331         goto exit_point;
00332     }
00333     TRACE(  " Ok\n");
00334 
00335     // Allocate buffer storage
00336     data_buff= malloc( DATA_BUFF_SIZE);
00337     if ( data_buff== NULL) {
00338         // Insufficient memory
00339         TRACE1( "Error allocating events' buffer (%i bytes)", DATA_BUFF_SIZE);
00340         ret_val= -5;
00341         goto exit_point;
00342     }
00343     // Allocate histogram storage
00344     {
00345         int i;
00346         for ( i= 0; i< MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS; i++) {
00347             histo_buff[ i]= malloc( MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES* sizeof( *histo_buff[i]));
00348             if ( histo_buff[ i]== NULL) {
00349                 // Insufficient memory
00350                 TRACE1( "Error allocating histogram' buffer (%li bytes)", (long)( MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES* sizeof( *histo_buff[i])));
00351                 ret_val= -5;
00352                 goto exit_point;
00353             }
00354             memset( histo_buff[i], 0, MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES* sizeof( *histo_buff[i]));
00355         }
00356     }
00357     if ( strlen( user_setting.m_parsed_output_filename)) {
00358         // Create output files
00359         if ( ( parsed_out_file= fopen( user_setting.m_parsed_output_filename, "wt"))== NULL) {
00360             TRACE1( "Error creating parsed output file '%s'", user_setting.m_parsed_output_filename);
00361             ret_val= -5;
00362             goto exit_point;
00363         }
00364     }
00365     if ( strlen( user_setting.m_raw_output_filename)) {
00366         if ( ( raw_out_file= fopen( user_setting.m_raw_output_filename, "w+b"))== NULL) {
00367             TRACE1( "Error creating raw output file '%s' \n", user_setting.m_raw_output_filename);
00368             ret_val= -5;
00369             goto exit_point;
00370         }
00371     }
00372 
00373     //
00374     // Start acquisition
00375     TRACE( "\n");
00376     TRACE( "\nHit 's' to start acquisition , any other to quit ...\n");
00377     switch ( getch()) {
00378     case 's':
00379     case 'S':
00380         break;
00381     default:
00382         ret_val= -4;
00383         goto exit_point;
00384     }
00385     // open gnuplot for the first time
00386     {
00387         char *gnu_plot_filename= (char*)malloc( MAX_FILENAME_LENGHT);
00388         sprintf( gnu_plot_filename, "%s%s", user_setting.m_gnu_plot_path, GNUPLOT_COMMAND);
00389 
00390         // open the pipe
00391         if (( gnu_plot_pipe = popen( gnu_plot_filename, "w"))== NULL) {
00392             TRACE( "N957 GNU Plot pipe creation failure");
00393             ret_val= -3;
00394             free( gnu_plot_filename);
00395             goto exit_point;
00396         }
00397 
00399         //fprintf( gnu_plot_pipe, "ch = %d; mod = %d; unit = %d; sens = %f\n", ChSel, ModSel, Unit, Sensitivity);
00400         free( gnu_plot_filename);
00401     }
00402 
00403     // gnu plot commands
00404     strcpy( aux_string, "load 'plot_histo.cfg'\n");
00405     if ( fwrite( aux_string, 1, strlen( aux_string), gnu_plot_pipe)!= strlen( aux_string)) {
00406         // out file write error
00407         TRACE( "\n Pipe write failure\n");
00408         ret_val= -3;
00409         goto exit_point;
00410     }
00411 
00412     TRACE( "\nAcquisition running ...\n");
00413     TRACE( "\nHit 'r' to reset histogram");
00414     TRACE( "\nHit 'p' to pause/resume");
00415     TRACE( "\nHit 'c' to select the channel to plot");
00416     TRACE( "\nAny other to quit ...");
00417     TRACE( "\n");
00418 
00419     while(( read_events< user_setting.m_num_events)|| (user_setting.m_num_events<= 0)) {
00420         //static long last_read_bytes= 0;
00421         //static long read_bytes= 0;
00422         data_size= DATA_BUFF_SIZE;
00423         while ( paused) {
00424             if ( kbhit()) {
00425                 switch ( getch()) {
00426                 case 'r':
00427                 case 'R': {
00428                     // reset the histogram here
00429                     int i;
00430                     for ( i= 0; i< MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS; i++) {
00431                         memset( histo_buff[i], 0, MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES* sizeof( *histo_buff[i]));
00432                     }
00433                 }
00434                 break;
00435                 case 'p':
00436                 case 'P':
00437                     paused= !paused;
00438                     break;
00439                 case 'c':
00440                 case 'C':
00441                     act_channel= channel_select( act_channel);
00442                     break;
00443                 default:
00444                     ret_val= 0;
00445                     goto exit_point;
00446                 }
00447             }
00448             Sleep( 1);
00449         }
00450 
00451         //
00452         // Read from MEB .....
00453         if ( !cvt_V792_read_MEB( &board_data, data_buff, &data_size)) {
00454             TRACE( " \nError executing cvt_V792_read_MEB \n");
00455             ret_val= -5;
00456             goto exit_point;
00457         }
00458 
00459         //
00460         // .... and store raw data into file (if enabled)
00461         if ( raw_out_file) {
00462             if ( fwrite( data_buff, 1, data_size, raw_out_file)!= data_size) {
00463                 TRACE( " \nError writing raw data file \n");
00464                 ret_val= -5;
00465                 goto exit_point;
00466             }
00467         }
00468 
00469         //read_bytes+= data_size;
00470         //if( ( read_bytes>> 10)!= ( last_read_bytes>> 10))
00471         //{
00472         //      //
00473         //      // Give user a feedback every 1KB data
00474         //      TRACE( ".");
00475         //}
00476         //last_read_bytes= read_bytes;
00477         // Process the data
00478         {
00479             UINT32 *tmp_buff= (UINT32*)data_buff;
00480             char line[ 400];
00481             size_t str_len;
00482 
00483             while (((long)(data_size-=4) > 0)&&
00484                     (( read_events< user_setting.m_num_events)|| (user_setting.m_num_events<= 0))) {
00485                 UINT32 data= *(tmp_buff++);
00486                 *line= '\0';
00487 
00488                 if ( kbhit()) {
00489                     switch ( getch()) {
00490                     case 'r':
00491                     case 'R': 
00492                                                 {
00493                                                         // reset the histogram here
00494                                                         int i;
00495                                                         for ( i= 0; i< MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS; i++) {
00496                                                                 memset( histo_buff[i], 0, MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES* sizeof( *histo_buff[i]));
00497                                                         }
00498                                                 }
00499                                                 break;
00500                     case 'p':
00501                     case 'P':
00502                         paused= !paused;
00503                         break;
00504                     case 'c':
00505                     case 'C':
00506                         act_channel= channel_select( act_channel);
00507                         break;
00508                     default:
00509                         ret_val= 0;
00510                         goto exit_point;
00511                     }
00512                 }
00513 
00514                 switch ( data& CVT_QTP_DATA_TYPE_MSK) {
00515                 case CVT_QTP_HEADER: 
00516                                         {
00517                                                 // header
00518                                                 UINT32 geo= CVT_QTP_GET_HDR_GEO( data);
00519                                                 UINT32 crate= CVT_QTP_GET_HDR_CRATE( data);
00520                                                 UINT32 ch_count= CVT_QTP_GET_HDR_CH_COUNT( data);
00521 
00522                                                 sprintf( line, HDR_STR, geo, crate, ch_count);
00523                                         }
00524                                         break;
00525                 case CVT_QTP_EOB: 
00526                                         {
00527                                                 // EOB
00528                                                 UINT32 geo= CVT_QTP_GET_EOB_GEO( data);
00529                                                 UINT32 event_count= CVT_QTP_GET_EOB_EVENT_COUNT( data);
00530 
00531                                                 sprintf( line, EOB_STR, geo, event_count);
00532 
00533                                                 ++read_events;
00534                         }
00535                             break;
00536                 case CVT_QTP_DATUM: 
00537                                         {
00538                                                 // DATUM
00539                                                 UINT32 geo= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_GEO( data);
00540                                                 UINT32 ch= 0;
00541                                                 UINT32 adc= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_ADC( data);
00542                                                 UINT32 un= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_UN( data);
00543                                                 UINT32 ov= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_OV( data);
00544 
00545                                                 switch ( user_setting.m_qtp_type) {
00546                                                 case CVT_V792_TYPE_A:
00547                                                         ch= CVT_V792A_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00548                                                         break;
00549                                                 case CVT_V792_TYPE_N:
00550                                                         ch= CVT_V792N_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00551                                                         break;
00552                                                 case CVT_V965:
00553                                                         ch= CVT_V965_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00554                                                         break;
00555                                                 case CVT_V965_TYPE_A:
00556                                                         ch= CVT_V965A_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00557                                                         break;
00558                                                 case CVT_V785_TYPE_A:
00559                                                         ch= CVT_V785A_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00560                                                         break;
00561                                                 case CVT_V785_TYPE_N:
00562                                                         ch= CVT_V785N_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00563                                                         break;
00564                                                 case CVT_V1785:
00565                                                         ch= CVT_V1785_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00566                                                         break;
00567                                                 case CVT_V775_TYPE_A:
00568                                                         ch= CVT_V775A_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00569                                                         break;
00570                                                 case CVT_V775_TYPE_N:
00571                                                         ch= CVT_V775N_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
00572                                                         break;
00573                                                 default:
00574                                                         // Unmatched case !??!
00575                                                         ret_val= -5;
00576                                                         goto exit_point;
00577                                                 }
00578                                                 // Histogram update
00579                                                 // sanity checks
00580                                                 if ( ch< sizeof( histo_buff)/sizeof( histo_buff[0])) {
00581                                                         ++histo_buff[ ch][ adc& (MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES- 1)];
00582                                                 }
00583                                                 sprintf( line, DATUM_STR, geo, ch, adc, un, ov);
00584                                         }
00585                                         break;
00586                 case CVT_QTP_NOT_VALID_DATUM: 
00587                     // NOT VALID DATUM
00588                     sprintf( line, NOT_VALID_DATUM_STR);
00589                                         break;
00590                                 default: 
00591                     // UNKNOWM data type !!?!
00592                     // sprintf( line, UNKNOWN_STR, data);
00593                                         break;
00594                 }
00595                 if ( (str_len= strlen( line))> 0) {
00596                     if ( parsed_out_file) {
00597                         if ( fwrite( line, 1, str_len, parsed_out_file)!= str_len) {
00598                             // error writing file
00599                             TRACE1( "\nError writing parsed output file '%s' \n", user_setting.m_parsed_output_filename);
00600                             ret_val= -5;
00601                             goto exit_point;
00602                         }
00603                     }
00604                 }
00605             }
00606         }
00607         if ( get_time()>= next_refresh) {
00608             int sample;
00609             FILE* histo_file= NULL;
00610 
00611             next_refresh= get_time()+ user_setting.m_gnu_plot_refresh;
00612             if (( histo_file= fopen( HISTO_FILENAME, "wt"))== NULL) {
00613                 // out file write error
00614                 TRACE1( "\nHistogramn output file creation failure '%s'", HISTO_FILENAME);
00615                 ret_val= -3;
00616                 goto exit_point;
00617             }
00618 
00619             // Save data to histogram file
00620             for ( sample= 0; sample< MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES; sample++) {
00621                 // Check for user commands
00622                 if ( kbhit()) {
00623                     switch ( getch()) {
00624                     case 'r':
00625                     case 'R': 
00626                                                 {
00627                                                         // reset the histogram here
00628                                                         int i;
00629                                                         for ( i= 0; i< MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS; i++) {
00630                                                                 memset( histo_buff[i], 0, MAX_HISTO_SAMPLES* sizeof( *histo_buff[i]));
00631                                                         }
00632                                                 }
00633                             break;
00634                     case 'p':
00635                     case 'P':
00636                         paused= !paused;
00637                         break;
00638                     case 'c':
00639                     case 'C':
00640                         act_channel= channel_select( act_channel);
00641                         break;
00642                     default:
00643                         ret_val= 0;
00644                         goto exit_point;
00645                     }
00646                 }
00647                 sprintf( aux_string, "%ld\n", histo_buff[ act_channel][ sample]);
00648                 //sprintf( aux_string, "%f\t%ld\n", (float)i* user_setting.m_gnu_plot_x_scale, histo_buff[ i]);
00649                 if ( fwrite( aux_string, 1, strlen( aux_string), histo_file)!= strlen( aux_string)) {
00650                     // out file write error
00651                     TRACE( "\n Histogram file write failure\n");
00652                     ret_val= -3;
00653                     goto exit_point;
00654                 }
00655             }
00656             fclose( histo_file);
00657 
00658             // write to gnuplot
00659             strcpy( aux_string, "plot 'histo.dat' with histogram 2\n");
00660             // strcpy( aux_string, "set style histogram rows\n plot 'histo.dat' using 2, '' using 4, '' using 6:xticlabels(1)\n");
00661             if ( fwrite( aux_string, 1, strlen( aux_string), gnu_plot_pipe)!= strlen( aux_string)) {
00662                 // out file write error
00663                 TRACE( "\n Pipe write failure\n");
00664                 ret_val= -3;
00665                 goto exit_point;
00666             }
00667             fflush( gnu_plot_pipe);
00668             Sleep( 1);
00669         }
00670     }
00671     TRACE(  "\n Done \n");
00672 
00673 exit_point:
00675     // Library specific
00677 
00678     //
00679     // Release board resources
00680     if ( !cvt_V792_close( &board_data)) {
00681         TRACE( "\nError executing cvt_V792_close\n");
00682     }
00683 
00685     // Demo application specific
00687 
00688     if ( gnu_plot_pipe!= NULL) {
00689         fprintf( gnu_plot_pipe, "exit\n");
00690         pclose( gnu_plot_pipe);
00691     }
00692 
00693     if ( raw_out_file!= NULL) {
00694         fclose( raw_out_file);
00695     }
00696     if ( parsed_out_file!= NULL) {
00697         fclose( parsed_out_file);
00698     }
00699     if ( data_buff!= NULL) {
00700         free( data_buff);
00701     }
00702     {
00703         int i;
00704         for ( i= 0; i< MAX_HISTO_CHANNELS; i++) {
00705             if ( histo_buff[ i])
00706                 free( histo_buff[ i]);
00707         }
00708     }
00709 
00710     // close modules
00711     user_settings_close( &user_setting);
00712 
00713     TRACE( "Hit a key to exit ...");
00714     getch();
00715 
00716     return ret_val;
00717 }
